articles.title: AI chip startup MatX, founded by Google alums, raises Series A at $300M+ valuation, sources say - TechCrunch

articles.content: MatX, a startup designing chips that support large language models, has raised a Series A of approximately $80 million, three sources say, less than a year after raising its $25 million seed round. … [+2049 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk has pledged to settle Mars. This book offers a reality check - CTV News
articles.description: The promise of starting life anew on Mars may appear alluring as the climate crisis intensifies and space and rocket technology advances. But the reality would be dreadful, according to experts.
articles.content:
The promise of starting life anew on Mars may appear alluring, even feasible, as the climate crisis intensifies and space and rocket technology advances.
